document.docAuthor: Bolger, Thomas, Arroyo, Julio & Piotrowska, Katarzyna
document.masterDocTitle: A catalogue of the species of Mesostigmata (Arachnida, Acari, Parasitiformes) recorded from Ireland including information on their geographical distribution and habitats

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: A catalogue of the species of Mesostigmata (Arachnida, Acari, Parasitiformes) recorded from Ireland including information on their geographical distribution and habitats

subSubSection.paragraph:
• Combinations/variations used in Irish literature:
Rhodacarus minimus (Karg) ( Purvis, 1982 )
. Irish Records : Dune at seashore ( Purvis, 1982 ). Counties: Wexford .

• Original name :
Rhodacarellus epigynialis perspicuus Halaśkova, 1959
Irish Records : Pasture ( Little & Bolger, 1995 , Piotrowska, 2009 ; unpublished data).
Counties: Carlow, Dublin, Galway, Kildare, Limerick, Meath, Wexford .

• Combinations/variations used in Irish literature:
Rhodacarus ancorae Karg ( Purvis, 1982 )
.

Irish Records : Dune, pasture,
Iris
bog, bracken bed, gorse bank and
Salix
ditch at seashore ( Purvis, 1982 ).

bibRefCitation.author: Hull, J. E.
bibRefCitation.refString: Hull, J. E. (1918) Terrestrial Acari of the Tyne province. Transactions of the Natural History Society Northumberland, Durham and Newcastle, 5, 13 - 88

subSubSection.paragraph:
• In :
Transactions of the Natural History Society of Northumberland
,
Durham and Newcastle -upon -Tyne
, 5: 57.

• Combinations/variations used in Irish literature:
Rhodacarus roseus var. pallidus Hull ( Halbert, 1920 )
.

Irish Records : In marshy area near lake ( Halbert, 1920 ); upper seashore ( Halbert, 1920 ); on decaying roots ( Halbert, 1920 ); pasture ( Curry, 1969a , 1971 ; Valarasan, 1971 ; Ganley, 1976 ; Purvis, 1978 ; Bolger, 1980; unpublished data); pasture on peat ( Whelan, 1976 , 1978 , 1985 ); fungal sporocarp ( O’Connell, 1994 ); pasture, rough grazing, broadleaved and coniferous forest (
Arroyo et al ., 2009
); Machair grassland ( Arroyo & Bolger, 2011 ); nest of
Lasius flavus
and pasture (
Arroyo et al ., 2015
); arable soil (Bolger, in press); soil under Leyland cypress, Monterey pine, Sitka spruce, Norway spruce and pasture (unpublished data); soil in ash and mixed broadleaved woodlands ( Little & Bolger, 1995; unpublished data ); soil under ash and Scots pine (
Arroyo et al ., 2012
, 2013a ); soil under birch, oak, lodgepole pine (unpublished data).
Counties: Donegal, Dublin, Galway, Kerry, Kildare, Laois, Limerick, Mayo, Meath, Offaly, Roscommon, Waterford, Wexford, Wicklow .
• In : Abhandlungen Naturwissenschaftlicher Verein zu Bremen , 35: 166.

Irish Records : Dune, pasture,
Iris
bog, bracken bed and gorse bank at seashore ( Purvis, 1982 ).
